fullplot: This Christmas movie is a comedy about the mistress of the owner a casino in Las Vegas and her boyfriend had stolen a disc containing financial irregularities in the Casino. Murray Crown,the owner of the casino, hires three murderers of balance to find Stella and her boyfriend and retrieve the disc.
